DOC.brief_summary: This study will test the efficacy and safety of IBI-10090 in the treatment of ocular inflammation after ocular surgery.
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy and Safety of IBI-10090 in Ocular Surgery Patients
DOC.criteria: Patients scheduled for unilateral cataract surgery Ocular, topical, or oral corticosteroids within 7 days of Day 0
